name: MyVoMail(Emailbyvoiceinput)
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: voice mailer
des:
This is a simple skill which converts your voice message into the text and send it to you by Email. You need to account link for the skill to know your Email address.
This may help in such a case someone in your home or anywhere your Echo is wants to send a Email to you. Or you would like to keep a small note without opening smartphone or PC.
The developer of this skill will be happy if this helps your daily life a bit.
